Issue.creator: avkrishnan
Issue.description: Today, our python code uses only one core. Because we use deques between processes, it lends itself fairly easily to a multi-process architecture. This story has us improving performance of nodes by leveraging more available cores on the server.h4. Plan of Attack|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1KSJUkRbmYdUB0bx5_BULF5T8oRqKkuCNRY679JL9g7E/edit
